Test utilities¶

testutils.create_file(dir_path)[source]¶

Creates a small random file, for testing.

Parameters:dir_path – (temporary) dir to create the file
Returns:full path to the file
testutils.dict_round_floats(dicti, decim=6)[source]¶

Go through a dict and round all floats (in keys and values) to a specific number of decimal places, to make it possible to compare a dict that has been saved and loaded, or some math applied.

Returns:no return value; substitution happens in-place!
testutils.get_random_string()[source]¶
Returns:random string of 2-16 printable characters, without newlines
testutils.get_random_word()[source]¶
Returns:random alphanumeric word of 2-16 characters
